## Electric Superheater Solicitation
### Publication Information
- **Publication Date**: October 18, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2022, at 14:00 EST
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3548225509
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact Information**:
  - **Name**: Shen, Tao (SPAC/PSPC)
  - **Email**: tao.shen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  - **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14368740?extsite=MTQzNjg3NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14368740?extsite=MTQzNjg3NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Solicitation Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the design, supply, and delivery of an electric superheater for the Natural Resources Canada - CanmetENERGY facility within the National Capital Area.

### Project Requirements
- **Project Objective**: Design, supply, and deliver one (1) electric gas superheater for a pilot-scale fluidized bed gasifier in support of research optimizing the conversion of biomass to renewable natural gas.
- **Delivery Schedule**: The contractor must deliver the electric superheater and all its related components no later than March 31, 2023.
- **Delivery Location**: The superheater will be delivered at a CanmetENERGY facility within the National Capital Area.

### Tender Information
- **Tender Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Important Notes
- **Language Requirements**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement, and documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- **Submission Requirements**: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 14, 2022, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.
